parameters: \n<\N[2]>Bring me those bread \N[1]. I need them for the meal I'm making.
\n<\N[2]>I take it \N[4] showed you the gardens?\. Well that's good because I'm in dire need of some Bread.\! Do you think you could throw me together some?
\af[1]\n<\N[1]>I have the wheat right here, how can I help?
\n<\N[2]>The recipe book over near the western wall. Take a look will you? Make me some bread.
\n<\N[2]>I need you to read that recipe book \N[1].
This book is filled with interesting recipes.
\n<\N[2]>You can make the bread over here, at the prep table.
\n<Kit>You're going to need some sugar, here's a few scoops.
\af[1]\n<\N[1]>Something is happening we have to leave!
\n<\N[2]>I'm down here! \N[1]. I'm... I'm ok.\. I think.
I should turn these Wheat into the kitchen first.
I should turn these Wheat into the kitchen first.
